com.philips.platform.uid.drawable

Class SeparatorDrawable

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.graphics.drawable.Drawable
      • com.philips.platform.uid.drawable.SeparatorDrawable

  • public class SeparatorDrawable
extends android.graphics.drawable.Drawable
    The type Divider drawable. This class can be used as utility class for setting divider and and its height
